instructions.da: Drej let til venstre mod Destination 1
instructions.en: Make a slight left towards Destination 1
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ete maldekstren direkte al Destination 1
instructions.es: Gira a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à gauche en direction de Destination 1
instructions.hu: Forduljon enyhén balra a Destination 1 irányába
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kiri menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Fai una leggera curva a sinistra verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: 斜め左に曲がり、Destination 1へ向かう
instructions.ko: 약간 좌회전 하신 후 Destination 1로 가세요.
instructions.my: Destination 1ဆီသို့ ဘယ်ဘက်အနည်းငယ်ချိုးကွေ့ပါ
instructions.nl: Rechts afbuigen om op Destination 1 te blijven
instructions.no: Sving svakt til venstre mot Destination 1
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo w łagodny zakręt na Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva suave a esquerda em direção a Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à esquerda em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Virați ușor la stânga spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните налево в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sl: Zavijte rahlo levo v smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde sola hafif dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно ліворуч у напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên trái về Destination 1
instructions.yo: Ṣe diẹ si apa osi si ọna Destination 1
